A Choice in Chaos - 2023

World War Z meets 28 Days Later in this chaotic, postapocalyptic thriller from debut author Toby Sanders.


After the apocalypse, is there anything but chaos?

Twenty years ago, the X2H virus all but destroyed the world. Now, a sparsely populated England holds the sole survivors. Kyle Frost lost his parents to the victims of the virus, monsters now called Wretches. After his home is attacked, Kyle must seek the help of the legendary Major Blake Armstrong, leader of the Rangers.

But all is not as it seems as Kyle falls headlong into conspiracy, lies and deceit. He must use all his skills to survive and make unlikely allies as he seeks order from the chaos of the apocalypse.

Gold Fever - 2023

As men seek to tame the Canadian wilds, three brothers strike gold in the Nahanni valley but they and those who follow fail to return. When their bodies are found, one detail is clear. Each of their heads is missing...


Stephen King meets Andy McNab in this thriller as Special Forces soldiers are hunted through the Canadian wilderness.

Fresh from the war in Europe, Liam Stryker is bored and desperate for action. Soon, he and his comrades are catapulted into the Canadian wilderness in search of gold and adventure.

But the Nahanni river is ancient and its rushing depths hide more than just metal. The cautionary tales of those who came before weigh heavily on them.

As the land begins to surrender its bounty, Liam and his friends realise that the legends are more than just stories. But other forces are at play and soon the clash of modern weapons and an ancient secret dull the gleaming of gold.

In this pulse pounding tale of greed, bravery and terror, the Nahanni Valley becomes a crucible where the boundaries between reality and myth blur, and the true price of fortune is measured in blood.

Passage of Revenge - 2023

The hunter becomes the hunted in this tale of corruption and greed.


When Detective Harmann's arrogance gets an innocent woman killed, he sets in motion a slew of crimes which he must solve. His fury builds as he realises the crooks are mocking him, intentionally recreating his most famous solved crimes.

For all his moral failings, Harmann is a crack investigator and along with his partner Moore, he must race to identify his enemy and bring them to justice.

But his enemies are spurred by reasons Harmann cannot guess at and the intricacies of the crimes play the corrupt Detective straight into their hands. Staring back, Harmann will finally see the Passage of Revenge.

Immortal Ascended - 2023

Radoq is a Domerus, the warrior class born to protect humanity.

When he is defeated and fails to protect the mortal lun'erus, Radoq's guilt overwhelms him. Enslaved and brutalised, he must play the role he was born to, standing as a leader even when he does not believe in himself.

But Radoq's duty cannot be ignored and the life he has lost beckons. But all is not as it seems. A new Sheriff has corrupted his home and imprisoned his family. His lover is disgusted by the very sight of him and a wily criminal seems to be the only one he can trust.

Radoq will be forced to navigate between romance, duty and power. In epic airship battles to towering mountaintop citadels, the burdens of leadership and duty will weigh heavily on him as he puts the needs of others before his own. Ultimately, he will have to choose between what is simple, and what is right.
